Subject: Tcl on Raspberry Pi
Description: Tcl/Tk and the Raspberry Pi are both cheap and easy (to use). Tcl can use the Pi's GPIO and i2c busses to control external hardware, execute compiled applications, process data and more. Clif will introduce Tcl/Tk and show how to acquire and process images, control stepper motors and interact with the real world.  Speakers include:Clif Flynt - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
